introduction.para: The provided XML content appears to be a part of an S1000D documentation module. This document outlines the procedure for cleaning and maintaining a bicycle.

step.para: Cleaning the bicycle with water to remove dirt.
Using a brush to access hard-to-reach areas, such as shift levers, knobbly tires, and brakes.
Removing caked grime from the chain and sprockets using a screwdriver.
Degreasing the freewheel assembly using a specified degreaser.
Flushing the sprockets, derailleurs, chain rings, and chain with water.

step.title: Clean the Bicycle
step.para: Use water to remove all dirt from the bicycle.
Refer to Figure 1: Cleaning the Bike for more information.

step.title: Access Hard-to-Reach Areas
step.para: Use a brush (e.g., seq-0002) to access areas that are not easy to clean, such as:

step.title: Remove Caked Grime
step.para: Clean the caked grime from the chain and sprockets using a screwdriver with a small blade.

step.title: Degrease the Freewheel Assembly
step.para: Use sup-0001 to degrease the freewheel assembly as shown in Figure 2: Degreasing the Freehub.
Remove grease from parts such as:

listitem.para: Guide and tension wheels of the derailleur

step.title: Flush with Water
step.para: Flush the sprockets, derailleurs, chain rings, and chain with water.
If necessary, repeat the flush procedure.

alternateProcedures.para: Depending on the bicycle model (e.g., app-0002 or app-0001), alternative steps may be taken:

step.para: Soak a sponge (seq-0003) in sup-0002 and water.
Clean the bicycle with the soaked sponge.
Flush the bicycle to remove all detergent.
Move the bicycle up and down on its tires to remove excess water.
Soak a sponge (seq-0003) in sup-0003 and water.
Clean the bicycle with the soaked sponge.
Soak the sponge again in sup-0002 and water.
Fully clean the bicycle with the soaked sponge.
Flush the bicycle to remove all detergent.
Move the bicycle up and down on its tires to remove excess water.

supportEquipment.para: The following support equipment is required:

listitem.para: seq-0002: Brush for accessing hard-to-reach areas.
seq-0003: Sponge for cleaning the bicycle.

degreaserAndDetergent.para: The following degreaser and detergent are required:

listitem.para: sup-0001: Degreaser for the freewheel assembly.
sup-0002: Detergent for general cleaning (Model app-0002).
sup-0003: Detergent for general cleaning (Model app-0001).

figure.title: Figure 2: Degreasing the Freehub
figure.para: [Insert image of degreasing the freewheel assembly]

bicycleModels.para: The following bicycle models are applicable:

listitem.para: app-0001: Specific model requiring unique cleaning procedure.
app-0002: Another specific model with its own cleaning requirements.
